Subject: Re: Azores Islands

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Sinnertwin quickly follows Cutthroat, and forms the other legs for
Hung-grr to land on. As the larger part lands, both Rippersnapper and
Blot join onto him, completing the behemoth, who holds his arms up with
clenched fists.
